name: Finding Sam (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 46 "Keep it alive"

The "newest" version has the authorized bugfixes submitted short after the 72h deadline. Play this one if you want the best experience! ;-)

The "LDversion" is the version we uploaded at the end of jam to meet the deadline. It's playable, but has some glitches when choosing characters to talk to. It's there as an honorable mention in case you really want to play the 72h version we submitted by the deadline.

Instructions:

Click on a character to interact with them (other characters become unavailable).

While in the dialog, use the clues icons buttons (clues about sam) to figure out more about sam.

When done talking to the character, click the exit icon so all characters become available again.

Please help us get qualified for rating, we're only 4 reviews short!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/finding-sam
